name: inter-dimensional-syntax
readme:
# inter-dimensional-syntax theme

A syntax theme for [Atom](https://atom.io/) with colors from Rick and Morty on a dark barkground. The code is mostly based on the [Dracula](https://atom.io/themes/dracula-syntax) for Atom syntax theme. The colors have been curated from the animated TV show Rick and Morty.
description: A syntax theme for Atom with colors from Rick and Morty on a dark barkground
